org.demoiselle.signer.cryptography

Interface Cryptography

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CriyptographyImpl

    public interface Cryptography
    Defines the default behavior for using encryption. Can be symmetric or asymmetric, it depends only on its implementation.
    See Also:
    CriyptographyImpl

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] cipher(byte[] content)
      Returns the content passed as parameter, encrypted.
      byte[] decipher(byte[] content)
      Returns the content passed as a parameter, decrypted.
      Key generateKey()
      Generates key for encryption.
      void setAlgorithm(AsymmetricAlgorithmEnum algorithm)
      Changes the algorithm and settings for asymmetric cryptography to be used.
      void setAlgorithm(String algorithm)
      Changes only the encryption algorithm to be used.
      void setAlgorithm(SymmetricAlgorithmEnum algorithm)
      Changes the algorithm and symmetric encryption settings to be used.
      void setKey(Key key)
      A cryptographic key is required to perform encryption.
      void setKeyAlgorithm(String keyAlgorithm)
      Alters only the key of the algorithm to be used
      void setProvider(Provider provider)
      Changes the encryption provider to be used.
      void setSize(int size)
      Change the size of the key if it is necessary to generate the key.

        void setAlgorithm(SymmetricAlgorithmEnum algorithm)
        Changes the algorithm and symmetric encryption settings to be used.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - algorithm representation
        See Also:
        SymmetricAlgorithmEnum

        void setAlgorithm(AsymmetricAlgorithmEnum algorithm)
        Changes the algorithm and settings for asymmetric cryptography to be used.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - algorithm representation
        See Also:
        AsymmetricAlgorithmEnum

        void setAlgorithm(String algorithm)
        Changes only the encryption algorithm to be used.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - algorithm name

        void setKeyAlgorithm(String keyAlgorithm)
        Alters only the key of the algorithm to be used
        Parameters:
        keyAlgorithm - algorithm name

        Changes the encryption provider to be used.
        Parameters:
        provider - new provider
        See Also:

      • setSize

        void setSize(int size)
        Change the size of the key if it is necessary to generate the key.
        Parameters:
        size - key size

      • setKey

        void setKey(Key key)
        A cryptographic key is required to perform encryption. Symmetric Encryption uses SecretKey Asymmetric encryption uses PublicKey and PrivateKey
        Parameters:
        key - key

      • cipher

        byte[] cipher(byte[] content)
        Returns the content passed as parameter, encrypted.
        Parameters:
        content - content to be ciphered
        Returns:
        ciphered content

      • decipher

        byte[] decipher(byte[] content)
        Returns the content passed as a parameter, decrypted.
        Parameters:
        content - ciphered content to be decrypted
        Returns:
        decrypted content

      • generateKey

        Key generateKey()
        Generates key for encryption.
        Returns:
        generated key
